meanings.definition: In an unmitigated manner; completely or entirely.
meanings.sent1: She unmitigatedly believed in the power of kindness.
meanings.sent2: The storm unmitigatedly destroyed the entire village.
meanings.sent3: He unmitigatedly ate all the cookies in one sitting.
meanings.sent4: The news of the accident unmitigatedly shook the small town.
meanings.sent5: The teacher unmitigatedly praised the student's hard work.

meanings.definition: Without any attempt to lessen the severity or seriousness.
meanings.sent1: The criminal unmitigatedly confessed to the crime.
meanings.sent2: She unmitigatedly ignored all warnings and continued on her path.
meanings.sent3: The cat unmitigatedly knocked over the vase and then looked innocent.
meanings.sent4: His unmitigatedly blunt words left everyone speechless.
meanings.sent5: The politician unmitigatedly promised to fix all the problems in one day.
